title: Silicon Valley Had Its Heyday. Can Tech Ecosystems Now Grow Inland?
description: The AOL co-founder Steve Case sees a need for entrepreneurial hubs beyond the coasts. “Let’s have it be a few dozen cities,” he says.
dc:creator: Vivian Giang
media:credit: Maddie McGarvey for The New York Times
media:description: Steve Case, a co-founder of AOL, during his “Rise of the Rest” tour in Columbus, Ohio, in 2017.
